casebody.data:
Leonard P. SABATINO, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, Respondent. No. 01-3288. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: July 10, 2002.

Before MICHEL, SCHALL and LINN, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
